generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Entity MeleeAttackBaseDefinition
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Allows a mob to deal damage through a melee attack.

fields.title: Attack Once
fields.description: Allows the mob to perform this melee attack behavior only once during its lifetime.

fields.title: Can Spread On Fire
fields.description: Allows the mob, if on fire and empty handed, to ignite its target upon a successful attack.

fields.title: Cooldown Time
fields.description: Cooldown time, in seconds, between consecutive attacks.

fields.title: Inner Boundary Time Increase
fields.description: Time, in seconds, added to the attack path recalculation interval when the target is beyond "path_inner_boundary".

fields.title: Max Path Time
fields.description: Maximum base time, in seconds, before recalculating a new attack path to the target (before increases are applied).

fields.title: Melee Fov
fields.description: Field of view, in degrees, used by the hard-coded sensing component to detect a valid attack target.

fields.title: Min Path Time
fields.description: Minimum base time, in seconds, before recalculating a new attack path to the target (before increases are applied).

fields.title: Outer Boundary Time Increase
fields.description: Time, in seconds, added to the attack path recalculation interval when the target is beyond "path_outer_boundary".

fields.title: Path Fail Time Increase
fields.description: Time, in seconds, added to the attack path recalculation interval when the mob cannot move along the current path.

fields.title: Path Inner Boundary
fields.description: Distance at which to increase attack path recalculation by "inner_boundary_time_increase".

fields.title: Path Outer Boundary
fields.description: Distance at which to increase attack path recalculation by "outer_boundary_time_increase".

fields.title: Random Stop Interval
fields.description: Defines a 1-in-N chance for the mob to stop its current attack, where N equals "random_stop_interval".

fields.title: Require Complete Path
fields.description: Specifies whether a full navigation path from the mob to the target is required.

fields.title: Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Multiplier applied to the mob's movement speed when moving toward its target.

fields.title: Track Target
fields.description: Allows the mob to track its target even if it lacks a hard-coded sensing component.

fields.title: x Max Rotation
fields.description: Maximum rotation, in degrees, on the X-axis while the mob is trying to look at its target.

fields.title: y Max Head Rotation
fields.description: Maximum rotation, in degrees, on the Y-axis while the mob is trying to look at its target.
